trans-unit.resname: This project is carried out in the context of guaranteeing to the user an easier access to information around a defined address, otherwise, the main objective of the web-site is to offer services near a given address. Therefore, after entering the address by the user, the site makes available a complete list of centers of interest located nearby, more precisely within a radius of one or two kilometers (Restaurants, Velib , Green spaces...). In addition, this site covers several areas and targets different targets, it is primarily intended for tourists (visitors of Paris). However, it can also be useful for contractors wishing to invest in Paris by optimizing their access to relevant information concerning the services located near a given address.
trans-unit.source: This project is carried out in the context of guaranteeing to the user an easier access to information around a defined address, otherwise, the main objective of the web-site is to offer services near a given address. Therefore, after entering the address by the user, the site makes available a complete list of centers of interest located nearby, more precisely within a radius of one or two kilometers (Restaurants, Velib , Green spaces...). In addition, this site covers several areas and targets different targets, it is primarily intended for tourists (visitors of Paris). However, it can also be useful for contractors wishing to invest in Paris by optimizing their access to relevant information concerning the services located near a given address.
trans-unit.target: Ce projet est réalisé dans le cadre de garantir à l’utilisateur un accès plus facile à l’information autour d’une adresse saisie, autrement dit, celui-ci a pour objectif principal de proposer les services à proximité d’une adresse donnée. De ce fait, après la saisie de l’adresse par l’utilisateur, le site met à sa disposition une liste complète des centres d’intérêt se trouvant aux alentours, plus précisément dans un rayon d’un ou deux kilomètre (Restaurants, Velib, Espaces verts...). En outre, ce site touche à plusieurs domaines et vise différentes cibles, il s’adresse en priorité aux touristes (visiteurs de Paris). Néanmoins, celui-ci peut également être utile aux entrepreneurs souhaitant investir sur Paris en leur optimisant l’accès aux informations pertinentes concernant les services se trouvant à proximité d’une adresse donnée.

trans-unit.resname: The stars ratings refer to availability
trans-unit.source: The stars ratings refer to availability
trans-unit.target: Les notations etoiles font reference a la disponibilité
